content: simple yet stunning these socks are easy to make but eye-catching eyelets and twisted rib look nice in different colors i worked my socks in amazing colorway *quiet folly* by the uncommon thread both socks are worked the same way but the position of the heel flap determines right and left sock you may work smaller or larger socks by modifying yarn needle size and gauge -- suomenkielisessä ohjeessa on pieni virhe kärkikavennuksissa *toistetaan kerrosta 1 * ei suinkaan kerrosta 2 kuten ohjeessa lukee
